product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Digital Clothes Dryer - Modern Home Essential
product_details.description:
• Sleek White Design with Modern Digital Display and LED Time Indicator
• Multiple Drying Cycles: Normal, Heavy Duty, Delicate, and More
• User-Friendly Control Panel with Easy-to-Use Selection Dial
• Large Capacity Drum with Generous Loading Door
• Digital Time and Temperature Controls for Precise Drying
• Energy-Efficient Operation to Help Reduce Utility Bills
• Wrinkle Prevention Option Available
• Built-in Maintenance Reminder System
• Convenient Front-Loading Design
• Stackable Design to Save Space (when paired with compatible washer)
• Multiple Temperature Settings for Various Fabric Types
• Quick Dry Option for Small Loads
• Modern White Finish that Complements Any Laundry Room

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern home appliance advertisement centered around a front-load dryer. At the top, it features a bold headline (`heading`) in a heavy typeface, followed by a friendly and upbeat subheading (`tagline`). The central focus is a high-quality product image (`product_image`), prominently displayed for visual impact. Just below the image, supporting descriptive text (`description`) outlines key selling points. The price (`price`) is boldly stated to attract immediate attention. At the bottom, a prominent call-to-action button (`cta`) with a clean background (`cta_button_background`) invites user interaction. The banner uses gradient background and soft circle accents for a clean, modern appeal.

**Color Palette**:
- Gradient Background: `#F0F5FC` to `#D5DDE8`
- Text primary: `#333333`
- Accent text: `#5A7D9A`
- Description text: `#4A4A4A`
- Button background: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern Insignia dryer, primarily showcasing a crisp white body (#FFFFFF) that conveys cleanliness and sophistication. The door area uses a strong contrast with a glossy black ring (#1A1A1A) and a dark transparent center (#2B2B2B), drawing focus to its functional centerpiece. Accents include subtle steel tones on the dial (#C0C0C0) and touches of blue (#1E90FF) and red (#FF4500) around the control knob for visual guidance. The blend of white and black is smooth yet distinct, enhancing visibility and elegance. This monochrome palette highlighted with smart color pops can be used for a clean, tech-forward ad visual.
